info.toGithub: 请在Github参与翻译、增补音频或提出建议
info.notOfficial: 本站为爱好者作品，和官方没有关联

readme.randomPlay: 这个按钮可以随机播放
readme.stop: 这个按钮可以停止播放
readme.overlapOn: 现在可以同时播放多个按钮了
readme.overlapOff: 这个按钮可以开启重叠播放
readme.autoRandomOn: 现在播放结束会随机播放下一个按钮了
readme.autoRandomOff: 这个按钮可以开启随机连播
readme.loop_0: 这个按钮可以切换连续播放模式
readme.showInfoOn: 这个按钮可以切换成分类排序
readme.showInfoOff: 这个按钮可以查看按钮的出处

info.toGithub: Please participate in the translation, audio supplement or suggestions in GitHub
info.notOfficial: This site is NOT a official creation

action.randomplay: Can you choose one for me nya?

readme.overlapOn: Now you can play voice at the same time
readme.autoRandomOn: Now will be played randomly at the end of play
readme.showInfoOn: This button can be switched to sort by category
readme.showInfoOff: This button allows you to see where the button came from
